column5: Well me and Justin got out on the river to try 1 st kick at some walleye. Didn't get any walleye but justin  caught a big fat carp on a buckshot  ice was 3 " to 4 " and we both had nice fish checking out our baits ...back out tomorrow store will be open for bait this coming Saturday for you ice junkies . ;D
Is it thick everywhere now? tried to PM you but it wouldnt let me send for some reason.
Awsome! Who needs stinking walleye when you can catch beasts like that
LOL thought that was a giant brookie at first look! Nice catch
I have only been out front of my Marina there is open water down river near vics from them moven fish tugs around ...so I can not answer that ...i would guess its 3 to 4" in most places ...
And there's Kingsmill flying by on his MXZ in the background, lol.
